recipes.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
recipes.description: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and black pepper.
recipes.instructions: Cook pasta. Fry pancetta. Mix eggs and cheese. Combine all ingredients while pasta is hot.

recipes.name: Chicken Tikka Masala 69
recipes.description: A flavorful Indian curry dish with marinated chicken in a creamy tomato sauce.
recipes.instructions: Marinate chicken. Grill until charred. Make sauce with onions, spices, and tomatoes. Add cream and chicken.

recipes.name: Avocado Toast
recipes.description: A simple and nutritious breakfast with mashed avocado on toasted bread.
ingredients: Optional: eggs, cherry tomatoes, feta cheese
recipes.instructions: Toast bread. Mash avocado with lemon juice, salt, and pepper. Spread on toast. Add toppings as desired.
